001import java.util.List;
002import java.util.Stack;
003
004/**
005 *  This class is part of the "World of Zuul" application.
006 *  "World of Zuul" is a very simple, text based adventure game.
007 *
008 *  This class creates all rooms, creates the parser and starts
009 *  the game.  It also evaluates and executes the commands that
010 *  the parser returns.
011 *
012 * @author  Michael Kolling and David J. Barnes
013 * @version 1.0 (Jan 2003) DB edited (2019)
014 */
015public class GameEngine
016{
017    private Parser        aParser;
018    private Room          aCurrentRoom;
019    private Stack<Room> aLastRooms;
020    private UserInterface aGui;
021
022    /**
023     * Constructor for objects of class GameEngine
024     */
025    public GameEngine()
026    {
027        this.aParser = new Parser();
028        this.aLastRooms = new Stack<>();
029        this.createRooms();
030    }
031
032    public void setGUI( final UserInterface pUserInterface )
033    {
034        this.aGui = pUserInterface;
035        this.printWelcome();
036    }
037
038    /**
039     * procédure affichant le message au marriage du jeu
040     */
041    private void printWelcome() {
042        this.aGui.println("Welcome to the World of Zuul!\nYour goal: solve puzzles.\nType 'help' if you need help.\n\n");
043        this.printLocationInfo();
044        if (this.aCurrentRoom.getImageName() != null)
045            this.aGui.showImage(this.aCurrentRoom.getImageName());
046    }
047
048    /**
049     * procédure affichant la room actualle ansi que toutes les sorties disponibles
050     */
051    private void printLocationInfo() {
052        this.aGui.println(this.aCurrentRoom.getLongDescription());
053        if ( this.aCurrentRoom.getImageName() != null )
054            this.aGui.showImage( this.aCurrentRoom.getImageName() );
055    }
056
057    /**
058     * Procédure pour créer toutes les rooms
059     */
060    private void createRooms() {
061        Room main = new Room("Main Room", "images/mainImage.png");
062        main.addItem(new Item("test", "1er item test", 2));
063        main.addItem(new Item("arme", "une arme", 17));
064
065        Room prehistoric = new Room("Prehistoric", "images/prehistoricImage.png");
066        Room moyenAge = new Room("Moyen Age", "images/moyenAgeImage.png");
067        Room antiquity = new Room("Antiquity", "images/antiquityImage.png");
068        Room egypte = new Room("Egypte", "images/egypteImage.png");
069        Room romaine = new Room("Romaine", "images/romanImage.png");
070        Room grece = new Room("Grece", "images/greceImage.png");
071        Room maya = new Room("Maya", "images/mayaImage.png");
072        Room china = new Room("China", "images/chinaImage.png");
073
074        main.setExit("north", moyenAge);
075        main.setExit("south", maya);
076        main.setExit("east", egypte);
077        main.setExit("west", prehistoric);
078        main.setExit("up", china);
079
080        prehistoric.setExit("east", main);
081
082        moyenAge.setExit("south", main);
083        moyenAge.setExit("east", antiquity);
084
085        antiquity.setExit("south", egypte);
086
087        egypte.setExit("west", main);
088        egypte.setExit("north", antiquity);
089        egypte.setExit("south", grece);
090
091        grece.setExit("north", egypte);
092        grece.setExit("west", romaine);
093
094        romaine.setExit("east", grece);
095
096        maya.setExit("north", main);
097
098        china.setExit("down", main);
099
100        this.aCurrentRoom = main;
101    }
102
103    /**
104     * Given a command, process (that is: execute) the command.
105     * If this command ends the game, true is returned, otherwise false is
106     * returned.
107     */
108    public void interpretCommand( final String pCommandLine ) {
109        this.aGui.println( "> " + pCommandLine );
110        Command vCommand = this.aParser.getCommand( pCommandLine );
111
112        if ( vCommand.isUnknown() ) {
113            this.aGui.println( "I don't know what you mean..." );
114            return;
115        }
116
117        switch (vCommand.getCommandWord()) {
118            case "help" -> this.printHelp();
119            case "go" -> this.goRoom(vCommand);
120            case "quit" -> {
121                if ( vCommand.hasSecondWord() ) {
122                    this.aGui.println( "Quit what?" );
123                } else {
124                    this.endGame();
125                }
126            }
127            case "look" -> this.look(vCommand);
128            case "eat" -> this.eat();
129            case "back" -> this.back(vCommand);
130            default -> this.aGui.println("I don't know what you mean...");
131        }
132    }
133
134
135    // implementations of user commands:
136
137    /**
138     * procédure affichant l'aide
139     */
140    private void printHelp() {
141        this.aGui.println("\nYou are lost. You are alone.\n\nYour command words are:");
142        this.aGui.println(aParser.getCommandString());
143    }
144
145    /**
146     * Procédure permettant d'aller dans la salle souhaiter
147     * après l'execution de la commande {@code go <nom de la salle>}
148     * @param pCommand
149     */
150    private void goRoom(final Command pCommand) {
151        if (!pCommand.hasSecondWord()) {
152            this.aGui.println("Go where ?");
153            return;
154        }
155
156        Room vNextRoom = this.aCurrentRoom.getExit(pCommand.getSecondWord());
157        if (vNextRoom == null) {
158            this.aGui.println("There is no door !");
159            return;
160        }
161
162        this.aLastRooms.push(this.aCurrentRoom);
163        this.aCurrentRoom = vNextRoom;
164        this.printLocationInfo();
165    }
166
167    /**
168     * procédure affichant la room actualle ansi que toutes les sorties disponibles
169     */
170    private void look(Command pCommand) {
171        if (pCommand.hasSecondWord()) {
172            Item actualItem = this.aCurrentRoom.getItemByName(pCommand.getSecondWord());
173            if (actualItem != null) {
174                this.aGui.println(actualItem.getLongDescription());
175                return;
176            }
177
178            this.aGui.println("I don't know how to look at something in particular yet.");
179            return;
180        }
181
182        this.aGui.println(this.aCurrentRoom.getLongDescription());
183    }
184
185    private void eat() {
186        this.aGui.println("You have eaten now and you are not hungry any more.");
187    }
188
189    private void back(final Command pCommand) {
190        if (pCommand.hasSecondWord()) {
191            this.aGui.println("Cette commande n'accept pas de second paramètre");
192            return;
193        }
194
195        if (this.aLastRooms.isEmpty()) {
196            this.aGui.println("Vous ne pouvez plus revenir en arrière");
197            return;
198        }
199
200        this.aCurrentRoom = this.aLastRooms.pop();
201        this.printLocationInfo();
202    }
203
204    private void endGame()
205    {
206        this.aGui.println( "Thank you for playing.  Good bye." );
207        this.aGui.enable( false );
208    }
209
210}
